pkgmetadata.longdescription: # gef-file-to-mapUtility library for parsing of .gef files, written for [pygef](https://github.com/cemsbv/pygef).### Run locally```sh# Install maturin inside a Python environmentpython3 -m venv .envsource .env/bin/activatepip install maturin# Create a Python package from the Rust codematurin develop# Open a GEF file locallypython>>> from gef_file_to_map import parse>>> gef_to_map(open('./tests/test.gef').read())```
